mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ym AS "ym", a.qsrq AS "qsrq", a.jsrq AS "jsrq", a.line_id AS "lineId", a.line_code AS "lineCode", a.linename AS "linename", a.power_qua AS "powerQua", a.nonpower_qua AS "nonpowerQua", a.sale_qua AS "saleQua", a.waste_qua AS "wasteQua", a.trwaste_qua AS "trwasteQua", a.waste_rate AS "wasteRate", a.comp_wrate AS "compWrate", a.salequa_insdh AS "salequaInsdh", a.wastequa_insdh AS "wastequaInsdh", a.trwastequa_insdh AS "trwastequaInsdh", a.wasterate_insdh AS "wasterateInsdh", a.compwrate_insdh AS "compwrateInsdh", a.powerrate AS "powerrate", a.yglj AS "yglj", a.wglj AS "wglj", a.sslj AS "sslj", a.sclj AS "sclj"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xs_statistics_110( id, ym, qsrq, jsrq, line_id, line_code, linename, power_qua, nonpower_qua, sale_qua, waste_qua, trwaste_qua, waste_rate, comp_wrate, salequa_insdh, wastequa_insdh, trwastequa_insdh, wasterate_insdh, compwrate_insdh, powerrate, yglj, wglj, sslj, sclj ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ym}, #{qsrq}, #{jsrq}, #{lineId}, #{lineCode}, #{linename}, #{powerQua}, #{nonpowerQua}, #{saleQua}, #{wasteQua}, #{trwasteQua}, #{wasteRate}, #{compWrate}, #{salequaInsdh}, #{wastequaInsdh}, #{trwastequaInsdh}, #{wasterateInsdh}, #{compwrateInsdh}, #{powerrate}, #{yglj}, #{wglj}, #{sslj}, #{sclj} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xs_statistics_110 SET ym = #{ym}, qsrq = #{qsrq}, jsrq = #{jsrq}, line_id = #{lineId}, line_code = #{lineCode}, linename = #{linename}, power_qua = #{powerQua}, nonpower_qua = #{nonpowerQua}, sale_qua = #{saleQua}, waste_qua = #{wasteQua}, trwaste_qua = #{trwasteQua}, waste_rate = #{wasteRate}, comp_wrate = #{compWrate}, salequa_insdh = #{salequaInsdh}, wastequa_insdh = #{wastequaInsdh}, trwastequa_insdh = #{trwastequaInsdh}, wasterate_insdh = #{wasterateInsdh}, compwrate_insdh = #{compwrateInsdh}, powerrate = #{powerrate}, yglj = #{yglj}, wglj = #{wglj}, sslj = #{sslj}, sclj = #{sclj} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM xs_statistics_110 WHERE qsrq = #{qsrq} AND jsrq = #{jsrq}
